title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama, enabling easy integration of local LLMs into Python apps.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter that plugs Ollama models into chains, agents, retrieval pipelines, etc.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich, self-hosted ChatGPT-style web interface for any Ollama model.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI prompt tool with conversation memory, model switching, and markdown output.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration allowing Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Community Camunda Connectors that call Ollama models from BPMN processes.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stacks with GPU support, web UI, and monitoring.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation to install and run Ollama declaratively on NixOS or via flakes.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama with C# and F# examples, NuGet package.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir wrapper that brings Ollama models into Phoenix apps with GenServer streaming.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to containerize and test Ollama models inside CI pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo showing how to build a private RAG system with Ollama, Chroma, and LangChain.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with any local Ollama model.
